largest_number.title: Largest Number
largest_number.instructions: Create a function that takes a list of numbers and returns the largest number in the list.

add_two_numbers.title: Add Two Numbers
add_two_numbers.instructions: Create a function that takes two numbers and returns their sum.

check_number_even.title: Check Number Even
check_number_even.instructions: Create a function that takes a number and returns whether the number is even or not.

most_common_number.title: Most Common Number
most_common_number.instructions: Create a function that takes a list of numbers and returns a list of the numbers that appear the most times. Return None if there no numbers appear more than others.

longest_word_in_sentence.title: Longest Word In Sentence
longest_word_in_sentence.instructions: Create a function that takes a string and returns a list of the longest word(s) in that string.
longest_word_in_sentence.example_input: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
